home.heroSubtitle: Joyina isebe eliphakamileyo apho uphando luhlangana khona nophuculo. Fumana uphando oluthuthukileyo, imfundo eguqulayo, nenxaxheba yomhlaba.
home.welcomeIntro: SiyiNgxenye yeComputer Science eYunivesithi yaseStellenbosch—indawo apho ukufundisa nophando kuhamba kunye.
home.welcomeHistory1: ISebe leComputer Science lasungulwa ngo-1972. Ngoku sidibene neMathematics neApplied Mathematics size sakha iNgxenye yeComputer Science kwiSebe leMathematical Sciences.
home.welcomeHistory2: Okwangoku sinamalungu ali-11 apheleleyo abasebenzi bezemfundo abo uphando lwabo lusebenza kwisithuba samacandelo afana ne-Automata Theory, i-Broadband neMobile Networks, i-Software Engineering, ukuvavanya noKuqinisekisa kweProgramme, i-Robotics, i-Natural Language Processing, neMachine Learning.
home.worldClassResearchSub: Ukuvelisa okutya kusungula ikamva lobuchwepheshe nentlalo
home.learnFromLeadersSub: IFakalthi yethu ephakamileyo iquka abaphandi abakhokelayo, abafundisi abawine iindondo, nabasunguli bemboni abasungula ikamva le-computer science.
home.readySub: Joyina uluntu lwethu lwabasunguli, abaphandi, nabakhokeli bakamva kwi-computer science
home.aiDesc: Uphando oluthuthukileyo lwe-machine learning, deep learning, ne-neural network.
home.roboticsDesc: I-robotics ezisezingqondweni, iinkqubo ezizimeleyo, nokunxibelelana komntu ne-robot.
home.networksDesc: Uphando lwe-distributed systems, cloud computing, nobuchule be-network architecture.
home.cyberDesc: Ukhuseleko lwolwazi, i-cryptography, nobuchwepheshe bokugcina ubumfihlo.
home.news1Title: UProf we-CS uwine umphumo wophando lwe-AI
home.news1Desc: UProf. Anderson uqashelwe ngomsebenzi wophando we-neural architecture search.
home.news2Desc: Iqela lophando lifikelele kumgca omtsha wokulungisa impazamo ye-quantum.
home.news3Desc: Intsebenziswano entsha yemboni yokuphucula i-AI ne-machine learning.

research.heroSubtitle: Uphando olusemgangathweni womhlaba olusebenza nezona zingxaki zinzima kubuchwepheshe nentlalo
research.overviewSub: Uphando lwethu luhlelekile kwimacandelo amathandathu. Hlola iqela ngalinye ngezantsi ukuze ufumane amalungu, iindikimba, namakhonkco.
research.groupsSub: Amaqela asebenzisana adandalazisa umda kwimacandelo akhethekileyo
research.publicationsSub: Iziphumo zophando ezivela kubasebenzi nabaphandi bethu. Zonke iingcino zivela kwiiProfayili zabaBantu.
research.publicationsSearchPlaceholder: Sesha ngesihloko, ababhali, indawo, amagama aseleyo…
research.ctaSub: Sebenzisana nabaphandi abakhokelayo uze ube negalelo ekufumaneni okutya

automata-grammars.title: Ithiyori neeNciba ze-Automata neeGrammars
automata-grammars.summary: Sisebenzela iilwimi zesemthethweni, ithiyori ye-automata, neenciba zazo—kuquka ukuqina kokuchaza, i-symmetric difference NFAs, nolunxulumano noKuqinisekisa neNatural Language Processing.

software-verification.title: I-Software Engineering noKuqinisekisa
software-verification.summary: Uphando ekuqinisekiseni iinkqubo, ukuvavanya, ne-software engineering—kuquka ukusebenza kwe-symbolic execution, ukuthelekisa i-regular expression, neezixhobo zokulungisa nokhuseleko.

ml-ai.title: UkuFunda kweMachine neBuchule beNgqondo
ml-ai.summary: Ukuphucula ubuchule bengqondo ngokufunda okujulileyo, ukuqeqesha ukuqinisekisa, nokukhangela ubuchule be-neural architecture. Iinciba kwimbono, i-NLP, nokuhlalutya kwedatha.

networks-broadband.title: I-Broadband neeMobile Networks
networks-broadband.summary: Uphando kwi-distributed systems ezikhulayo, i-cloud ne-edge computing, nobuchwepheshe bemanethiwekhi ye-mobile ne-broadband.

robotics-vision.title: I-Robotics neComputer Vision
robotics-vision.summary: Ukuphucula amarobhoti anobuchule neenkqubo ezizimeleyo: ukuqonda, ukucwangcisa indlela, unxibelelwano lomntu ne-robot, nokusebenzisa ukusebenza kwindlela yokwenene.

nlp.title: Ukucoca ulwimi lwemvelo
nlp.summary: Umsebenzi wokucoca ulwimi lwemvelo, i-computational linguistics, nobuchwepheshe obuncedayo obudibanisa ulwimi ne-computation.

people.heroSub: Amalungu eFakalthi abahlonitshekileyo nabaphandi abaqhuba uphando kwiComputer Science eYunivesithi yaseStellenbosch.

contact.heroSub: Silapha ukuze siphendule imibuzo yakho size sikuxhase uhambo lwakho
contact.getInTouchSub: Nokuba ungumfundi ozayo, umfundi okhoyo, okanye umsebenzisani womboni, siyavuya ukuva kuwe.
contact.mapTip: Incebiso: Cofa "Iindlela" kwiapp yakho yemepu ukuze ukhokhele.

bridging.heroSub: Qala ngamandla: iziqhelo, iinkqubo zokuqala, nee references ezikhawulezayo.
bridging.overviewDesc: Ireference ekhawulezayo nesishwankathelo sekhonkco. Khuphela incwadi yesishwankathelo ukuze uqale.
bridging.newcomerTip1: Sebenzisa i-Java: javac MyFile.java emva koko java MyFile
bridging.newcomerTip2: Qokelela ukusuka kwifolda equlethe ifayili yakho ye-.java

links.title: Amakhonkco
links.subtitle: Ukufikelela ngokukhawuleza kwizibonelelo eziyinene zeyunivesithi nefakalthi.

institute-applied-cs.title: IInstitjuthi yeComputer Science esetyenziswayo
institute-applied-cs.description: Ngale ngeInstitjuthi, iinjongo, amalungu, uncwadi, neeprojekthi zakudala.

institute.title: IInstitjuthi yeComputer Science esetyenziswayo
institute.intro: Wamkelekile ekhasini lasekhaya leInstitjuthi yeComputer Science esetyenziswayo eYunivesithi yaseStellenbosch. IInstitjuthi yasungulwa ngo-1981 ngaphandle kwesinyathelo sikaProf AE Krzesinski noProf PS Kritzinger.
institute.objectivesIntro: Injongo yethu kukuthi sibe negalelo kumboni we-software waseMzantsi Afrika ngoku:
institute.objectives:
ukutsala abazibona becomputer science abenza uphando kwi-software engineering abanomdla wokunikezela uncedo kubashishino
ukuseka nokugcina unxibelelwano lwamazwe ngamazwe kumacandelo abalulekileyo ekwenzeni i-software
ukunikezela indawo esebenzayo yokuqeqesha abafundi abaphezulu abanokwenza isoftware yetheknoloji ethembekileyo
ukuthabatha amaprojekthi amanyeni nebishini kwamacandelo anjengo-embedded software, ukuvavanya nokuqinisekisa, idizayini yeeprotocol, ukwenziwa kwe-concurrent systems, abaqambi, nedizayini yeelwimi zeenjongo ezikhethekileyo, iidrayiva zezixhobo, njl.
ukuthuthukisa isoftware ekhethekileyo kubishini
ukwenza uphando lwobuchwepheshe xa kucelwa
ukubonisa iikhonkco ezifutshane kubishini xa kucelwa
institute.members:
UProf Willem Visser (UMlawuli)
UProf Jaco Geldenhuys
UProf AE Krzesinski
institute.addressBag: Ibhagi yangasese X1, 7602 Matieland, UMZANTSI AFRIKA
institute.pastProjects:
Phakathi kuka-1999 – 2014 kwaboniswa iikhonkco ezininzi kubishini. Olona khonkco lubaluleke kakhulu lwaluludari lweentsuku ezine lokuhlohla ulwimi lwe-programme olwabonisa 2012–2015 eCapaCITI (isinyathelo se-IT seSixeko saseKapa).

Phakathi kuka-1997 – 1998 kwakhiwa i-kernel ukuze ixhase amastack eeprotocol kwiipulatifomu ze-embedded ezinamandla aphantsi. Le kernel yathathwa yinkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika i-SAN People yaza yahlaziywa ukuze ixhase amastack eeprotocol ahlukeneyo kwiidivaysi ezi-embedded.

Ngo-1994 i-Gneiss microkernel yathuthukiswa njengenguqulelo ethuthukileyo ye-Hybrid kernel. I-Gneiss kernel yasuswa yi-Spescom-DataVoice ukwenza isixhobo sokurekhoda izwi sedijithali. Le mveliso ithengiswa ngokwelizwe nangaphandle kwezwe kwaye kwakhiwa iidrayiva zezixhobo ezininzi ze-Gneiss ukuze ixhase abalawuli bezixhobo abatsha.

I-Hybrid microkernel yathuthukiswa phakathi kuka-1990 – 1991. Le kernel yayidizayinelwe ukuxhasa izicelo ezinze kwi-client-server kwingingqi ephangaleleyo. I-Hybrid kernel yasuswa ukwenza isicelo esiphangaleleyo sokuqaphela iinkqubo zokukhiqiza kumafektri amaninzi asekhaya.

Ngo-1988 IInstitjuthi yabelwa umsebenzi yinkampani yaseMzantsi Afrika i-Technology Systems Manufacturing ukuthumela isixhobo sikaTanenbaum i-MINIX (isixhobo se-Unix) kwi-Data General minicomputer. Injongo yayikukuthuthukisa ubuchule basekhaya ekwenzeni i-program ye-system.

Phakathi kuka-1988 – 1993 kwakhiwa isoftware ye-Telkom SA ukuze ilungelelanise, iqaphele, ilungise, ize ihlalutye amanethiwekhi ayo.

I-SNAP, ipakethi yokumodela nokuhlalutya amanethiwekhi e-stochastic queueing, yathuthukiswa phakathi kuka-1978 – 1985. Yayisetyenziswa ikakhulu ukuqikelela ukusebenza kwiinkqubo ze-IBM mainframe. Ipakethi yathengiswa ku-UCCEL Corporation ngo-1985.

footer.tagline: Ukulungisa ikamva leComputer Science ngophando, uphando, nemfundo ephakamileyo.

errors.profileNotFoundSub: Umntu oyifunayo akasekho okanye ikhonkco lingase libe lunge.
errors.pageNotFoundSub: Uxolo, ipheji oyifunayo ayisekho okanye ithuthelwe.

achievements.emptySub: Buyela kamva ukuze ufumane iincwadi neziphumo eziphakamileyo.

study.undergradOverviewIntro: Inkqubo yethu yekhono elisezantsi inika imfundo epheleleyo kwi-computer science, idibanisa ulwazi lwethiyori nolwazi olusebenzayo. Abafundi bathuthukisa ukucinga okubalulekileyo, ukusombulula iingxaki, namakhono obuchwepheshe abalulekileyo empumelelweni kwindlela yobuchwepheshe yesimanje.
study.undergradPracticalSkillsDesc: Iiprojekthi zokusebenza, iimicinga zokubhala ikhowudi, neenciba zomhlaba wokwenene
study.undergradGlobalStandardsDesc: Ikharityhulam ehambelana neenkqubo ezilungileyo zamazwe ngamazwe
study.undergradRoadmapIntro: Uhambo olucwangcisiweyo lweminyaka emi-3 ukusuka kwiziseko ukuya kwiindikimba eziphambili
study.undergradHeroSub: Yakha isiseko esinamandla kwiComputer Science uze ulungiselele umsebenzi ophumelelayo kubuchwepheshe. Joyina inkqubo ehlanganisa uphuculo lwethiyori namakhono asebenzayo.
study.postgradHeroSub: Phucula uphando lwakho nobuchule ngolawulo ngezibonelelo ezinggangathweni womhlaba.

postgrad.s1Intro: Ukungena kwinkqubo yethu kusekelwe kwiikrayithriya zokukhetha, eziquka ukusebenza kwakho kwemfundo kunye nokuthi isakhono sakho sihambelana njani nesakhono esifunwayo kwinkqubo. Umthamo unomda kwaye ukungena kuqambelene, ngoko ke imiqathango ephantsi ayiqinisekisi ukungena.
postgrad.s1HonoursIntro: Ukuze ungene kwi-Honours kwiComputer Science, u:
postgrad.s1HonoursBullets:
Ufuna isidanga esiquka ikharityhulam yethu yeComputer Science
Kufuneka ube ne-avareji ye-65% okanye ngaphezulu kwii-modules zakho zeComputer Science ngonyaka wokugqibela (Iyearbook ibala 60%, kodwa ngenxa yomngeni omkhulu, ngokuthi kade ufuna ubuncinci 65%)
Kufuneka ube nesiseko semathematika esinamandla, esiquka i-Algebra neCalculus
Kufuneka ube nee-credits eziyi-32 ezingunyaka wesibini okanye wesithathu kwii-modules ezininzi, kuquka:
Kufuneka ube nolwazi lweprogramming olusebenzayo
postgrad.s1QuantitativeList:
IMathematics
I-Applied Mathematics
IPhysics
IMathematical Statistics
IBioinformatics
I-Operations Research
GIT242 Digital Photogrammetry
GIT341 Spatial Modeling (bona i-prerequisites)
postgrad.s1HonoursNote: Ukuhlangabezana nemiqathango ephantsi kuthetha ukuba uya kucingelwa ukukhethwa, kodwa akugqinisekisi ukungena.
postgrad.s1IndividualIntro: Ukuze ubhalise kuyo nayiphi imodyuli yekhono eliphezulu, ufuna:
postgrad.s1IndividualBullets:
Okanye isidanga kwiComputer Science
OKANYE
Ukugcwalisa yonke imiqathango ukuze ufumane esinye size usifumane emcimbini wokugqiba oculungisiweyo
Emathematika, iprogramming, nesakhono seComputer Science esifanayo nesifunwayo kwi-Honours
postgrad.s1MastersBullets:
Ifuna isidanga kwiComputer Science
Ifuna isidanga se-Honours
postgrad.s1DoctoralBullets:
Ifuna isidanga se-Masters esisekelwe kwithethisi
Ifuna isidanga esiquka isakhono seComputer Science esifunwayo
postgrad.s2Step1Intro: Ufuna ukuvumelana nomsebenzi oya kuqondisa ithethisi yakho.
postgrad.s2Step1Instructions:
Hlola amapheji oPhando
Funda iincwadi zabasebenzi
Chonga indawo onomdla kuyo
Qhagamshelana nomsebenzi othathayo
Cwangcisa indibano ukuba kunokwenzeka
Ukuvumelana ngetopiki akufunekanga keli qondo
Ukuvumelana ngoqondiso kubalulekile
postgrad.s2Step2Intro: Faka isicelo ngokugcwalisa amafom okufaka isicelo nokulayisha amaxwebhu afunwayo.
postgrad.s2Portals:
Iwebhusayithi yeStellenbosch University → Abafundi → Abafundi abazayo beKhono eliphezulu → Isicelo sukuya ku-SU
Iwebhusayithi yeScience Faculty → Ndingafunda ntoni? → Iinkqubo zeKhono eliphezulu
Iwebhusayithi yePostgraduate Studies → Isicelo sukuya ku-SU
postgrad.s2Closing:
I-Honours: Ukuphela kwe-Okthoba (khangela isayithi yeScience Faculty)
I-Masters ne-PhD: Ukuphela kweSeptemba (khangela isayithi yeScience Faculty)
postgrad.s3PartTimeBullets:
I-Honours inokwandisela ukuya kwiminyaka emibini elandelanayo
I-Masters inokwandisela ukuya kwiminyaka emithathu ukuya kune
Ifuna ukuzithoba nokuzinikela
postgrad.s3HonoursSpecificBullets:
Iprojekthi kufuneka igqitywe ngonyaka wokuqala okanye wesibini
Kufuneka ugqibe iimodyuli eziyi-6 zesemester
Iimodyuli ziboniswa ngeeyure zokusebenza kuphela
Akukho ziinkonzo zangemva kweeyure

Iimodyuli ze-16 credits = 8 ECTS credits
Zonke iimodyuli ziboniswa ngesiNgesi
postgrad.s4Bullets:
Akukho nkxaso yecebe ngqo
IYunivesithi inika uncedo
Kukho iibhasari zangaphandle
Abafundi bamazwe ngamazwe mabakhangele iindleko zabafundi nentlawulo → Intlawulo
postgrad.s4TeachingBullets:
Imbuyeko yemali eyongezelelweyo
Kuthenjelwe ukubandakanyeka
Inzuzo yophuculo lomsebenzi
postgrad.s4SupervisorBullets:
Inokuba nemali yophando
Ayiqinisekisiwanga
Kufuneka uxoxe ngqo nomqondisi

Iimodyuli ezine zesiseko zonyaka wesithathu zeComputer Science

Ifundwa kwi-Applied Maths 364

postgrad.applyCtaSub: Joyina uluntu lwethu lwabaphandi nebasunguli abanggangathweni womhlaba

honours.title: I-Honours kwiComputer Science
honours.desc1: Isidanga se-Honours yinkqubo yonyaka omnye ye-full-time ye-postgraduate elandela ngokuthi kade emva kwe-BSc okanye i-BCom yeminyaka emithathu. Kule minyaka emashumi mane anesihlanu abafundi abangaphezu kwe-600 abanethalente badlulile kwinkqubo yethu. Silungiselela ukulandela isidanga se-MSc okanye umsebenzi embonini. Oku kungenxa yengqokelela yenkqubo: intlanganisela yeethiyori zeComputer Science neekhonkco zenciba ezisandula.
honours.desc2: Isidanga se-Honours sinomdla kwaye sikho umsebenzi onzima kwaye abafundi kufuneka baphathe ixesha labo ngokuzimela kwaye basebenze ngokuzimela ngaphezu kwixesha labo lokuqala, ngakumbi kwiprojekthi yonyaka. Nangona kunjalo, siyaziqhayisa ngokuba abagqibeleleyo bethu bafunwa kakhulu. Isidanga sinokuba nefuthe kwimvuzo yakho yaye inkampani ezininzi zifuna isidanga seminyaka emine. Ulwazi olungakumbi, njengeenkqubo zokufaka isicelo ne-FAQ, luyafumaneka kwipheji yethu ye-Prospective postgraduate students.
honours.curriculumIntro:
Idizayini ye-full-time
I-part-time ubuncinci iminyaka emibini
Ukubakho ekilasini kuyimfuneko
Iprojekthi ye-Honours (32 credits)
Iimodyuli eziyithandayo ezintandathu (16 credits ngalinye)
honours.projectBullets:
Ukwakha isoftware enkulu okanye ingxaki yophando
Umsebenzi ozimeleyo
Uqondiswa
Ayilandeli iisemester zekhono elisezantsi
Iqala xa inikezelwe
Iphela ngedemo nentetho
Abafundi baphatha ixesha labo
honours.electiveBullets:
Kufuneka iimodyuli ezintandathu
Ukwakheka kweBlock okanye kwee-15 week
Iveki yovavanyo
Igqitywa ngonyaka
Ukuya kwiimodyuli ezimbini ezivela kuMathematics okanye i-Applied Mathematics (imvume iyafuneka)
Iimodyuli ezikhethekileyo: i-Digital Image Processing ne-Computer Vision
Zonke ezinye iimodyuli zangaphandle zifuna ukuvunywa
honours.studyPathBullets:
Gxila kwi-ML, i-Data Science, i-Software Engineering
Okanye ububanzi obubanzi
Uvavanyo lwabasebenzi ekuqaleni
honours.date1: 2 Feb ngo-10:00 – I-Hons Orientation (Igumbi K303, Knowledge Centre, Engineering)
honours.schedulesText: Ithebula yeklasi yesemester ngo-2026: iindawo TBC
honours.roadmapsIntro: Iindlela zokufunda zicetywayo kubafundi be-Honours. Khetha indlela ukuze ubone iimodyuli zicetywayo ngesemester.
honours.roadmapsDisclaimer: Iindlela ziyindlela zokufunda zicetywayo; ukunikezelwa kweemodyuli neenketho zixhomekeke ekufumanekeni nasekuvunyweni.

masters.title: I-Masters kwiComputer Science
masters.desc1: Isidanga sethu se-Masters yinkqubo yeminyaka emibini esekelwe kumsebenzi wethethisi. Injongo kukufundisa abafundi indlela yokuvavanya nokwenza uphando lwegangatho lomhlaba, nokuba ngumphathi kwicandelo labo. Nangona umsebenzi ungafunekanga ube uphando olusemqoka, ngokuqhelekileyo unjalo. Izakhono zokufunda, ukubhala, nokucinga ezinzulu ezifundwayo ngexesha lesidanga se-Masters nazo zifunwa kakhulu embonini, yaye uninzi lwabagqibeleleyo bethu be-Masters abangalandeli nesidanga se-PhD, baya kuphumelela embonini yasekhaya nangaphandle.
masters.supervisionBullets:
Kufuneka ufumane ukuvumelana komqondisi
Hlola amapheji oPhando
Hlola iincwadi zabasebenzi
Qhagamshelana nabasebenzi
Ukuvumelana ngetopiki akufunekanga phambi kokufaka isicelo
Ukuvumelana komqondisi kubalulekile
Indibano sobuso nesobuso iyacebiso
masters.admissionBullets:
Isidanga se-Honours kwiComputer Science
OKANYE
Isiqinisekiso esilinganayo esivunyiweyo

Uphando olungezelelweyo okanye iifundo ezingezelelweyo zinokufuneka
Ngokwekesi ngekesi
Ulwazi olungakumbi kwipheji ye-Prospective postgraduate students

doctorate.title: I-PhD kwiComputer Science
doctorate.desc1: I-PhD yethu kwiComputer Science yisidanga seminyaka emithathu esekelwe kuphela kumsebenzi wedissertation. Injongo kukwenza uphando lokuqala, olusemqoka kwicandelo elikhethekileyo leComputer Science. Umfundi kufuneka abonakalise amandla akhe okucetyisela, ukucwangcisa, ukwenza, nokupapasha iprojekthi yophando.
doctorate.supervisionText: Ufuna ukuvumelana nomsebenzi oya kuqondisa ithethisi yakho ye-PhD. Hlola amapheji ethu oPhando uze ufunde ngakumbi ngeendlela zomsebenzi esiwenzayo. Ungakhangela nazo iincwadi zabasebenzi bethu ukuze ube nengqondo yeendikimba abanomdla kuzo. Ukuba ufumene indawo yophando lwethu enomdla kuwe, qhagamshelana nomsebenzi othathayo ukuze nixoxe ngeendikimba ezinokwenzeka. Akufunekanga ukuvumelana ngetopiki ethile phambi kokufaka isicelo, kodwa kubalulekile kakhulu ukufumana ukuvumelana komsebenzi ukuba abe ngumqondisi wakho. Ukuba kunokwenzeka, yenza isicelo sendibano sobuso nesobuso.
doctorate.admissionText: Imiqathango yokungena ye-PhD kwiComputer Science yisidanga se-Masters kwiComputer Science okanye isiqinisekiso esilinganayo esivunyiweyo. Uphando olungezelelweyo okanye iifundo ezingezelelweyo zinokufuneka, ngokumiselwa ngumqondisi wakho ngokwekesi ngekesi. Ulwazi olungakumbi, kuquka iinkqubo zokufaka isicelo ne-FAQ, luyafumaneka kwipheji yethu ye-Prospective postgraduate students.

Ulwazi olungakumbi, kuquka iinkqubo zokufaka isicelo ne-FAQ, luyafumaneka kwipheji yethu ye-

prospectivePage.title: Iifundo zeKhono eliphezulu kwiComputer Science
prospectivePage.s1Intro: Ukungena kwinkqubo yethu kusekelwe kwiikrayithriya zokukhetha, eziquka ukusebenza kwakho kwemfundo kunye nokuthi isakhono sakho sihambelana njani nesakhono esifunwayo. Umthamo unomda kwaye ukungena kuqambelene, ngoko ke imiqathango ephantsi ayiqinisekisi ukungena:
prospectivePage.s1HonoursIntro: Ukuze ungene kwi-Honours kwiComputer Science, wena
prospectivePage.s1HonoursBullets:
ufuna isidanga esiquka ikharityhulam yethu yeComputer Science
kufuneka ube ne-avareji ye-65% okanye ngaphezulu kwii-modules zakho zeComputer Science ngonyaka wokugqibela. Iyearbook ibala i-60% njengemida yokufaka isicelo, kodwa ngenxa yenani leeziCeliso esizamkelayo ze-BSc Honours kwinkqubo ye-CS, ngokuthi kade ufuna ubuncinci 65%.
kufuneka ube nesiseko semathematika esinamandla, esiquka i-Algebra neCalculus
kufuneka ube nee-credits eziyi-32 ezingunyaka wesibini okanye wesithathu kwii-modules ezininzi, eziquka nayiphi imodyuli phantsi kwiziFundo: IMathematics, i-Applied Mathematics, iPhysics, iMathematical Statistics, iBioinformatics, ne-Operations Research neemodyuli: GIT242 Digital Photogrammetry ne-GIT341 Spatial Modeling (bona i-prerequisites)
kufuneka ube nolwazi lweprogramming olusebenzayo; isidanga sethu se-Honours sigxile kakhulu kwiprogramming kwaye kuyimfuneko ukuba ukwazi ukuprograma ukuze ugqibezelele isidanga se-Honours
prospectivePage.s1Note: Qaphela, ukuhlangabezana nemiqathango ephantsi kuthetha ukuba uya kucingelwa ukukhethwa, kodwa akugqinisekisi ukungena.
prospectivePage.s1IndividualPara: Ukuze ubhalise kuyo nayiphi imodyuli yekhono eliphezulu ufuna okanye isidanga kwiComputer Science okanye kufuneka sele ugcwalise yonke imiqathango ukuze ufumane esinye size usifumane emcimbini wokugqiba oculungisiweyo. Ngaphezu koko, emathematika, iprogramming, nesakhono seComputer Science esifanayo nesifunwayo kwi-Honours kwiComputer Science iyafuneka.
prospectivePage.s1Masters: Imiqathango yokungena ye-Masters kwiComputer Science yisidanga kwiComputer Science nesidanga se-Honours
prospectivePage.s1Doctoral: Imiqathango yokungena ye-PhD kwiComputer Science yisidanga se-Masters esisekelwe kwithethisi nesidanga esiquka isakhono seComputer Science esifunwayo.
prospectivePage.s2Step1: Eli nyathelo libe kubafundi abazayo be-Masters ne-PhD bodwa. Ufuna ukuvumelana nomsebenzi oya kuqondisa ithethisi yakho ye-Masters/PhD. Hlola amapheji ethu oPhando uze ufunde ngakumbi ngeendlela zomsebenzi esiwenzayo. Ungakhangela nazo iincwadi zabasebenzi bethu ukuze ube nengqondo yeendikimba abanomdla kuzo. Ukuba ufumene indawo yophando lwethu enomdla kuwe, qhagamshelana nomsebenzi othathayo ukuze nixoxe ngeendikimba ezinokwenzeka. Akufunekangi ukuvumelana ngetopiki ethile keli qondo, kodwa kubalulekile kakhulu ukufumana ukuvumelana komsebenzi ukuba abe ngumqondisi wakho. Ukuba kunokwenzeka, yenza isicelo sendibano sobuso nesobuso.
prospectivePage.s2Step2Intro: Eli nyathelo libe kubafundi bonke abazayo be-Honours, Masters, ne-PhD. Faka isicelo ngokugcwalisa amafom okufaka isicelo nokulayisha yonke imicwangciso efunwayo. Amakhonkco ayafumaneka ngamapheji amaninzi
prospectivePage.s2Portals:
iwebhusayithi yeStellenbosch University; phantsi kwimenyu yabafundi, khetha Abafundi abazayo beKhono eliphezulu. Amakhonkco ayafumaneka phantsi kwimenyu ye-Application to SU.
iwebhusayithi yeScience Faculty; phantsi kwimenyu ye-What can I study?, cofa i-Postgraduate Programmes. Amakhonkco ayafumaneka kweli pheji kunye naphantsi kwimenyu ye-Application to SU.
iwebhusayithi yePostgraduate Studies; amakhonkco ayafumaneka kweli pheji kunye naphantsi kwimenyu ye-Application to SU.
prospectivePage.s2Closing: Iintsuku zokuvala ze: izicelo ze-Honours: ukuphela kwe-Okthoba, kodwa sicela ukhangele isayithi yeScience Faculty umhla othile. Izicelo ze-Masters ne-PhD: ukuphela kweSeptemba, kodwa sicela ukhangele isayithi yeScience Faculty umhla othile.
prospectivePage.s3PartTimePara: Iyunivesithi ivumela abafundi ukungena njengabafundi be-part-time. Isidanga ngoko sandulula iminyaka emininzi; isidanga se-honours sinokwandisela ukuya kwiminyaka emibini elandelanayo. Isidanga se-Masters se-part-time sandulula iminyaka emithathu ukuya kune. Ngokuthi kade, oku kuyinketho enzima kwaye ifuna ukuzithoba nokuzinikela.
prospectivePage.s3HonoursNoteBullets:
Iprojekthi kufuneka igqitywe ngonyaka wokuqala okanye wesibini
Kufuneka ugqibe iimodyuli eziyi-6 zesemester zizonke, kodwa unokukhetha ukuzigqiba ngonyaka ni
Zonke iimodyuli zethu ziboniswa ngeeyure zokusebenza, kwaye akukho nketho okwangoku yokubukela iinkonzo emva kweeyure. Ukuba unomsebenzi we-full-time, kufuneka ucwangcise nomqeshwa wakho ukuze ubukele iinkonzo.
prospectivePage.s3ForeignPara: Siyakwamkela nazo izicelo zabafundi abangabasebenzini. Ngaphezu kweeinyathelo zokufaka isicelo ezichaziweyo ngasentla, kufuneka uqhagamshelane ne-Ofisi yePostgraduate yeyunivesithi ngeenkcukacha zolawulo ngokufunda eStellenbosch. IYunivesithi yaseStellenbosch ineziqheliso ezininzi neeyunivesithi zangaphandle, zenza lula ukucwangcisa ukutshintshana kwabafundi. Iimodyuli zethu ze-16 credits zilingana nee-8 ECTS credits, yaye zonke iimodyuli ziboniswa ngesiNgesi.
prospectivePage.s4Para1: IComputer Science ayiniki nkxaso ngqo kubafundi, kodwa iyunivesithi iphela iyayinika, kwaye kukho iibhasari ezininzi zangaphandle. Iportal yeyunivesithi yabafundi abazayo yimthombo olungileyo wolwazi malunga neebhasari ezinjalo neenkcukacha ezisandula ngeendleko zokufunda. (Abafundi bamazwe ngamazwe mabakhangele nesahluko "Student fees and funding » Funding" kwisayithi ye-Ofisi yePostgraduate.)
prospectivePage.s4Para2: Uninzi lweemodyuli zethu zekhono elisezantsi zifuna abancedisi abafundisayo kwaye silindela abafundi abazigqibeleleyo ukubandakanyeka ubuncinci enye yemodyuli enjalo. Nangona inganiki imbuyeko yemali eneleleyo ukuze ixhase iifundo zakho, le ndawo inokunika imbuyeko engongezelelweyo. Kodwa ngaphezu koko: ukuba umcedisi wokufundisa akuphela nje kwindlela entle yokunceda isizukulwana esilandelayo sabafundi beComputer Science neefundo zabo, kodwa nethuba elihle lokuziqinisa ulwazi lwakho!
prospectivePage.s4Para3: Abanye abaqondisi banemali yophando efunwayo ukuze baxhase abafundi be-Masters okanye be-PhD, kodwa kwakhona inganiki imbuyeko yemali eneleleyo ukuze igubungele zonke iindleko zakho. Qaphela ukuba awukwazi ukuthembela koku kwaye kufuneka uxoxe ngqo nomqondisi ngale nketho.
prospectivePage.s5Title: Zintoni i-prerequisites zeemodyuli zeKhono eliphezulu ngazinye?
prospectivePage.s5AllIntro: Zonke iimodyuli ze-honours eziboniswa yiComputer Science zifuna:
prospectivePage.s5AllBullets:
iimodyuli ezine zesiseko zonyaka wesithathu zeComputer Science,
IMathematics ne-Probability Theory & Statistics (Applied Mathematics) ukuya kunyaka wokuqala, kwaye
okulungileyo ubuncinci enye yeMathematics okanye i-Applied Mathematics ukuya kunyaka wesibini.
prospectivePage.s5DigitalBullets: ulwazi olusebenzayo lwe-Fourier Analysis; oku kufundwa kwi-Applied Maths 364.
prospectivePage.s5VisionBullets: i-linear algebra; oku kufundwa kwi-Applied Mathematics 214 neMathematics 214.
prospectivePage.s6Title: I-MSc enyaka enye ekhangelekileyo kwi-ML ne-AI
prospectivePage.s6ParaBefore: Ulwazi ngenkqubo yokufaka isicelo ye-MSc ekhangelekileyo kwi-Machine Learning ne-Artificial Intelligence, bona
prospectivePage.s7ParaBefore: Ukuba unemibuzo ethile, sicela uqhagamshelane nomququzeli wethu we-postgraduate ngokuthumela i-imeyile ku
